mapper.select:
select member.name name, mt.backnumber backnumber, mt.height height, mt.weight weight, team.seq team_seq, team.name teamname, member.image image, member.position position
from tblformation formation inner join tblplayerentry playerentry on playerentry.seq=formation.playerentry_seq inner join tblmember_team mt on mt.seq=playerentry.member_team_seq inner join tbltransfer transfer on transfer.seq=mt.transfer_seq inner join tblteam team on team.seq=transfer.team_seq inner join tblmember member on member.seq=transfer.member_seq where team.seq=#{team_seq} order by formation.seq
